member.name: M:MatrixLib.Matrix.Transpose
member.summary: Transpose is a method of interchange rows into columns and columns into rows
member.returns: the value of the row into column and the value of column into row

member.name: M:MatrixLib.Matrix.op_Addition(MatrixLib.Matrix,MatrixLib.Matrix)
member.summary: the operation of adding two matrices by adding the corresponding entries together
member.param: First matrice of the addition operation
Second matrice of the addtion operation
member.returns: the total value of both op1 and op2

member.name: M:MatrixLib.Matrix.op_Subtraction(MatrixLib.Matrix,MatrixLib.Matrix)
member.summary: The operation where element wise substraction applies to the matrices of the same order, which essentially means that substraction between two matrices can only happen when both pf them have the same number of rows and columns.
member.param: First matrice of the substraction in operation
Second matrice of the substraction in operation
member.returns: the subtration value of op1 and op2

member.name: M:MatrixLib.Matrix.op_Multiply(MatrixLib.Matrix,MatrixLib.Matrix)
member.summary: the operation of substraction two matrices by adding the corresponding entries together
member.param: First matrice of the multipication in operation
second matrice of the multiplication in operation
